about_the_game:
💍WEDDING BELLS ARE RINGING!💍

Prepare for a celebration of love like no other with Peachleaf Valley: Wedding Bells, a new DLC expansion for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love!"

This special expansion brings wedding-themed stories for each bachelor, allowing you to experience the magic, charm, and heartfelt emotions of tying the knot with your chosen love.

With beautiful, custom wedding outfits, breathtaking wedding venues, and exclusive CGs capturing each unique ceremony, Wedding Bells invites you to create a day to remember with pure romance and unforgettable memories. 💒🌸

  • Romantic Wedding Stories – Follow each bachelor’s wedding journey in stories filled with heartfelt moments and personal touches leading up to the big day.

  • Custom Wedding Outfits – Dress in beautifully designed wedding attire that captures the unique bond you share with each bachelor.

  • Enchanting (Optional) Animations – Delight in custom animations that bring wedding scenes to life, all fully customizable to match your perfect experience. With our customizable accessibility menu, you can tailor animations to suit your preferences, ensuring an experience as immersive—or streamlined—as you’d like. Craft your ideal playthrough and enjoy Peachleaf Valley your way!

  • Unique Wedding Venues – Explore new, hand-drawn backgrounds for each wedding story designed to enhance each bachelor’s romance.

  • Memorable CG Moments – Collect exclusive CGs of each individual and unique wedding day, capturing every romantic and tender moment.

  • Partial Voice Acting – Enjoy heartwarming performances by professional voice actors, adding depth and emotion to every vow and loving glance.

  • Custom Music Tracks – Experience new music inspired by each bachelor’s theme, setting the perfect mood for your special day.

  • New Characters and Guests – Meet familiar faces and new guests, each adding a touch of joy and excitement to your wedding day.

💍WEDDING BELLS ARE RINGING!💍

Prepare for a celebration of love like no other with Peachleaf Valley: Wedding Bells, a new DLC expansion for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love!"

This special expansion brings wedding-themed stories for each bachelor, allowing you to experience the magic, charm, and heartfelt emotions of tying the knot with your chosen love.

With beautiful, custom wedding outfits, breathtaking wedding venues, and exclusive CGs capturing each unique ceremony, Wedding Bells invites you to create a day to remember with pure romance and unforgettable memories. 💒🌸

  • Romantic Wedding Stories – Follow each bachelor’s wedding journey in stories filled with heartfelt moments and personal touches leading up to the big day.

  • Custom Wedding Outfits – Dress in beautifully designed wedding attire that captures the unique bond you share with each bachelor.

  • Enchanting (Optional) Animations – Delight in custom animations that bring wedding scenes to life, all fully customizable to match your perfect experience. With our customizable accessibility menu, you can tailor animations to suit your preferences, ensuring an experience as immersive—or streamlined—as you’d like. Craft your ideal playthrough and enjoy Peachleaf Valley your way!

  • Unique Wedding Venues – Explore new, hand-drawn backgrounds for each wedding story designed to enhance each bachelor’s romance.

  • Memorable CG Moments – Collect exclusive CGs of each individual and unique wedding day, capturing every romantic and tender moment.

  • Partial Voice Acting – Enjoy heartwarming performances by professional voice actors, adding depth and emotion to every vow and loving glance.

  • Custom Music Tracks – Experience new music inspired by each bachelor’s theme, setting the perfect mood for your special day.

  • New Characters and Guests – Meet familiar faces and new guests, each adding a touch of joy and excitement to your wedding day.

fullgame.name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love - a farming inspired otome

name: Peachleaf Valley: Wedding Bells (DLC)
